name: Elemental Transference
flavorText: The world around you vanishes, leaving you adrift in the sundered terrain of the Elemental Chaos.
text: Use this ritual in the world. When you perform this ritual, you transport yourself and up to eight allies to a random spot in the Elemental Chaos. You have no control over where you appear, but your immediate environs arenâ€™t hazardous. Once in the Elemental Chaos, you can travel as normal within the plane. You remain in the Elemental Chaos until you leave by another means.
